name: Core_Memory_copy
signature: Core_Result Core_Memory_copy(void *p, void const* q, Core_Size n);

parameters.name: p
parameters.description: A pointer to the target memory block.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: A pointer to the source memory block.

parameters.name: n
parameters.description: The number of Bytes to copy.

description: Assign each Byte of a memory block the specified value. The memory blocks must not overlap.
remarks: This function sets the by-thread error variable on failure.
